title: Wells Fargo Signals Big Rise in Legal Costs (Audio)
itunes:title: Wells Fargo Signals Big Rise in Legal Costs (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Laura Keller, Bloomberg News finance reporter, discusses why Wells Fargo has been warning investors of rising legal costs after releasing a quarterly list of inquiries and lawsuits currently facing the lender. She speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
